pathways.title: No Knowledge -> Junior
pathways.description: Start from programming basics and build consistent Go implementation habits.
pathways.level_outcome: You can implement small-to-medium Go functions with clear contracts, edge-case coverage, and readable tests.

pathways.title: Junior -> Mid
pathways.description: Shift from isolated functions to boundary-aware service and debugging work.
pathways.level_outcome: You can build and debug boundary-heavy Go code with explicit error handling and reliable runtime behavior.

pathways.title: Mid -> Senior
pathways.description: Consolidate advanced design, tooling discipline, and production reliability tradeoffs.
pathways.level_outcome: You can design, debug, and evolve senior-level Go solutions with strong operational and maintainability standards.
